3: Where do you think you're going!
The young lad blocks the rebels' escape and knocks over their chieftain.
Seeing their leader fall, the thieves kneel down in fright and surrender.
Only the young lad clad in an black robe stands resolute on the stage to a round of resounding applause.
This is just another night in Kowloong, way back in the past...
Unable to determine why 'she' would want to access such data.
Huaxu shows a brief pause in response.
It might have been to do with having a new master. Or perhaps Huaxu has yet to adapt to the way she handles things.
Even for the purpose of 'studying humanity', it is unknown as to why one would access such a wide range of data.
At this moment, Huaxu is floating in the center of a virtual space, and in front... are the data nodes that 'she' has requested for.
But... I will carry out the commands.
Huaxu waves, sending data to the place to the output node.
And an AI's prerogative is determined by its creator.
As long as this is the master's wish, an AI will do everything to fulfill the master's will.
